content: half spider web c i b rochet t aby © amanda hertz crochet it baby half spiderweb © amanda hertz www crochetitbaby etsy com please do not share re-sell redesign or redistribute any of my patterns or photos as they are copyright protected anything you make from these patterns can be sold please just mention that the pattern was created by crochet it baby and/or add the link to my store somewhere in your description thank you half spider web skill level - easy + ◉◉◎◎◎ materials/tools - light weight yarn - g/4 00mm hook - yarn needle stitch/stitches st chain stitch chain treble_crochet treble_crochet note to make a half spiderweb garland make a few half spiderwebs and join together half spiderweb round 1 - chain 6 first 5 chain counts as first treble_crochet and ch1 treble_crochet in sixth chain from hook chain 1 *treble_crochet chain 1 in same chain* repeat from * three more times treble_crochet once more in same chain 7 treble_crochet 6 ch1 spaces round 2 - chain 7 this counts as the first treble_crochet and ch3 turn work *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 3* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 7 treble_crochet 6 ch3 spaces round 3 - chain 9 this counts as the first treble_crochet and ch5 turn work *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 5* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 7 treble_crochet 6 ch5 spaces round 4 - chain 11 this counts as the first treble_crochet and ch7 turn work *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 7* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 7 treble_crochet 6 ch7 spaces round 5 - chain 7 this counts as the first treble_crochet and ch3 turn work treble_crochet in same st as ch7 chain 3 *treble_crochet chain 3 treble_crochet chain 3 in next treble_crochet* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet chain 3 treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 14 treble_crochet 13 ch3 spaces round 6 -
